title: Fatal haemorrhagic myocarditis secondary to cyclophosphamide therapy.
abst: Haemorrhagic myocarditis is a rare but important complication of cyclophosphamide therapy. Echocardiographic identification of the disorder can be made. We believe that the ultrasound features of this disorder have not been previously reported.
title_plus_abst: Fatal haemorrhagic myocarditis secondary to cyclophosphamide therapy. Haemorrhagic myocarditis is a rare but important complication of cyclophosphamide therapy. Echocardiographic identification of the disorder can be made. We believe that the ultrasound features of this disorder have not been previously reported.
split_sentence: Fatal haemorrhagic myocarditis secondary to cyclophosphamide therapy.
Haemorrhagic myocarditis is a rare but important complication of cyclophosphamide therapy.
Echocardiographic identification of the disorder can be made.
We believe that the ultrasound features of this disorder have not been previously reported.
